programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Vides fakti
programme.desc: Raidījums par norisēm dabā un apkārtējā vidē. "Vides fakti" sniedz informāciju par sezonālām norisēm dabā un dzīvnieku pasaulē, par vides aktualitātēm, par videi draudzīgu dzīvesveidu, par aktuālām cilvēka un vides attiecībām ārpus Latvijas robežām. Raidījumā "Vides fakti" ir skatāmi arī piedzīvojumu sižeti par aktīvā tūrisma iespējām Latvijā, kā arī īsfilmas par neparastiem ceļojumiem pasaulē.

programme.title: Mikrofona dziesmas
programme.desc: Jau sen aiz kalniem tas laiks, kad gada nogalē Latvijas Radio klausītāji ar nepacietību gaidīja "Mikrofona" dziesmu aptaujas rezultātus. Žurnālists Gunārs Jākobsons bija tas, kurš jau 1967. gadā lūkoja sarīkot speciālu latviešu dziesmu aptauju, sākumā bez klausītāju atsaucības, tomēr 1968. gadā aptauja izdevās, un tajā uzvarēja Raimonda Paula un Alfrēda Krūkļa dziesma "Mežrozīte", tobrīd atslēdznieka Zigfrīda Račiņa priekšnesumā. "Mikrofona" dziesmu aptauja ar dažiem pārtraukumiem notika līdz pat 1993. gadam.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: On this episode, agents of the Antinarcotics Division of Jorge Chavez International Airport, in Lima, Peru, deal with a case of unique characteristics. In the meantime, officials face language barriers as they detain an Indonesian woman. And a passenger is carrying what seem to be adorable baby blankets, but they are really full of narcotics. At the loading docks, a shipment containing 24 jars puts the drug-detecting dogs keen sense of smell to the test. Plus, the international flight rush hour results in 2 young passengers being detained side by side at the antinarcotics division headquarters.

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: In the mountains of Northern Italy, a grisly discovery is made by a couple of mountaineers. In a nearly unreachable part of the world, human remains are found sticking out from a glacier. These remains turn out to be those of the oldest ice mummy ever found. Researchers are shocked by the mans cause of death and realize they are investigating a homicide that is thousands of years old.

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Human remains are discovered near Croghan Hill, Ireland a place where ancient kings were once crowned. The investigation takes a turn when authorities realize the body is not a current missing person or murder victim, but rather one that is thousands of years old. As archeologists examine the remains, a story unfolds that reveals the gruesome murder of a King by his followers.

programme.title: Ancient Bodies: Secrets Revealed
programme.desc: Two bodies are discovered near the town of Weerdinge, Netherlands as locals jump to conclusions that the bodies belong to a man and woman likely united in life and death. But as scientists dive deeper into the mystery of these humans, more details are uncovered along with a surprising twistthe bodies are of two unrelated males. Who were these men and why were they murdered?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls: The Challenge
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper joins Bear on an adventure through the rugged canyons of the Wyoming Basin. Bear teaches Bradley how to use a grappling hook gun, as well as key mountaineering rope skills, to traverse a series of towering ravines. The two spend the night hanging on the side of a cliff, and on day two, Bradley is faced with daunting challenges during a harsh winter snowstorm.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls: The Challenge
programme.desc: Bear Grylls takes prolific Marvel superstar and venerated actor Benedict Cumberbatch on an adventure across the Isle of Skye in Scotland. They descend massive sea cliffs and brave freezing waterfalls. Bear teaches Benedict unique survival skills and surprises Benedict by connecting him to a part of his past with a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Riddles of the Bible
programme.desc: The Bible and the understanding of its prophetic word has been debated, contested and fought over for thousands of years. Even in modern times, the riddles of the Bible remain. Why is the story of Cain and Abel such a powerful one and what is the dark mystery surrounding it? Is there a scientific way to confirm the story of Noah and the Ark, or was it just that?a story? How did David, and subsequently his son, Solomon, propel a nation?or did they at all? Esteemed archeologists, biblical scholars, historians, among others, come together to explore these riddles and seek the ever elusive answers.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: What happens to us after we die? Where do we go? Is there any part of us that lives on? In the final episode of the series, Morgan Freeman sets out to understand humanitys obsession with the afterlife. He speaks to David Bennett, a man who died and came back to talk about it; Sam Parnia, a physician who is convinced something survives our physical bodies after death; archaeologist Jodi Magness, who reveals how one mans death granted humanity eternal life.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Morgan explores the way people around the world incorporate heaven and hell into their lives. From witnessing exorcisms in Ethiopia and the discovery of human sacrifice among the ancient Mayan to meeting a woman whos experienced her own heaven after a near death experience, this episode discovers heaven and hell are not just ideas but are part of us all, a part of what we yearn to escape and what we hope to become.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Where does evil come from? In a maximum-security prison, Morgan comes face to face with a serial killer, and looks for the physical root of evil in his brain. In an ancient tomb, Egyptologist Salima Ikram shows Morgan a depiction of the "weighing of the heart", and the birth of the belief that what you did in this life mattered in the next. Psychologist Jesse Bering has discovered that children who believe they are being watching by an invisible being obey the rules more than those who dont. Morgan encounters Zoroastrianism, whose belief in a cosmic balance of good and evil inspired the Christian Devil. In India, he discovers that Hindu believes evil stems from the tormented souls of ones ancestors, who are merely in need of release. Morgan explores the idea of redemption, when he former Neo-Nazi skinhead Bryon Widner, who turned his back on a life of evil.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: In this episode of "The Story of God," Morgan Freeman traverses the globe to ask: Where did we come from, and what happened "in the beginning?" Humanitys first question remains one of its most intensely debated. For many believers, it is impossible to understand who and what we are without first understanding how we got here...and who (or what) is behind it. Were we created in the image of God, or are we the result of a 13.8 million year old singularity? Morgan meets with papal representatives at the Vatican and Islamic scholars in Cairo. He visits Hindu philosophers in India and archeologists digging up the ancient Mayan past in the rain forests of Central America.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Violent cataclysms and fiery judgment fixate the popular imagination and fill numerous holy books. Morgan Freeman looks into this supposed future as well as past millennia of strife to determine how the world will end. His journey takes him to the desert that three faiths call home to pour over the Dead Sea Scrolls, and learn about the origins of the Jewish messiah. He decodes the enigmatic Mark of the Beast-666-in Rome, and sits down with a reformed Islamic terrorist. He travels to Guatemala to determine if the ancient Maya really predicted the end of the world, and learns from a psychologist why some people find comfort in catastrophes. On the brighter side, a visit with Hurricane Katrina survivors and a meditative session with one of the holiest men in all of Buddhism begins to realign Morgans perspective-what if the apocalypse is not a planetary bloodbath, but rather a mental paradigm shift?

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Is there some sense of God that all religions share? How has the identity of God changed over the millennia? In an epic quest to understand humanitys millions of gods, Morgan Freeman embarks on a deeply personal investigation that will take him around the world. Hell go from a modern American megachurch bursting with tens of thousands of people to Hindu temples bursting with millions of gods. He travels from the Navajo Nation in New Mexico where a Navajo girl communes with her divine ancestors, to the mosques of Cairo where Muslims speak to a God that has no physical from. He discovers how Stonehenge in pagan Britain is connected to a renegade Egyptian Pharaoh and to the birth of Judaism. And thanks to a high-tech mapping of Morgans brain, hell find out if God has a mental footprint.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: Every year millions of Christians take the pilgrimage to Jerusalem. They come to follow the Passion, the final steps of Jesus on his way to his death on the cross. Now one archaeologist claims they are worshipping at the wrong sites. He has tracked down crucifixion artifacts from the time of Christ and has been given unprecedented access to the most important shrine in Christendom - the place of the crucifixion. He believes he has discovered archaeological evidence that not only pin points the true locations but also provides fresh insights into the Passion of Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: This episode of Ancient X Files investigates what advances in science since the last time the shroud was tested, in 1988, might reveal about this mysterious religious relic. Developments in photo-imaging may have revealed letters hidden around the head. But who wrote them and why? One scientist believes he may have discovered that the image itself was created by a huge burst of electrical energy. Also in this episode, the discovery of a strange, buried structure dating back 4000 years could be the oldest temple in the Americas.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: The story of Noahs Flood washing away everything in its deadly path is not just an Old Testament tale. As well as the Bible and the Quran, similar flood stories appear in ancient cultures around the world. For centuries experts have wondered if the ubiquity of the story could be evidence of a real flood. Now new archaeological evidence unearthed in Bulgaria, Eastern Europe, may reveal not only where the Great Flood happened, but what caused it. Also in this episode, scattered around Scotland are ancient standing stones, inscribed with mysterious markings and symbols. Dr. Rob Lee, a scientist at Exeter University, believes he may have cracked their code and could be on the brink of revealing the language and secrets of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: Mary Magdalene has long been known as a repentant sinner, a saint, and perhaps most importantly, the witness to the resurrection. But author Margaret Starbird believes that she was also Jesus wife, mother of his child and victim of the biggest conspiracy in history. In this television exclusive she examines what some have claimed could be one of the earliest Christian artefacts ever discovered and untangles a riddle that she believes reveals the truth about this mysterious woman from the bible.

programme.title: Riddles of the Bible
programme.desc: The Bible and the understanding of its prophetic word has been debated, contested and fought over for thousands of years. Even in modern times, the riddles of the Bible remain. Why is the story of Cain and Abel such a powerful one and what is the dark mystery surrounding it? Is there a scientific way to confirm the story of Noah and the Ark, or was it just that?a story? How did David, and subsequently his son, Solomon, propel a nation?or did they at all? Esteemed archeologists, biblical scholars, historians, among others, come together to explore these riddles and seek the ever elusive answers.

programme.title: The Jesus Mysteries
programme.desc: Jesus Christ is one of the most famous names in the history of mankind. He is the core of belief for millions of Christians worldwide and his story has provided rich material for thousands of books and films. But the Gospel writers dont tell us much about his life, and even crucial events like the Nativity, the Miracles and even the Crucifixion have been adapted, embellished and rewritten over the course of hundreds of years. The Jesus Mysteries will re-examine the crucial elements of his story and question basic modern assumptions to reveal some surprising and often shocking details about his life and ministry.

programme.title: Buried Secrets of the Bible with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Could real events lie behind the parting of the Red Sea and the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah? To solve these mysteries, high-tech explorer Albert Lin will use satellites, drones, and space age technology to look beneath the earths surface and reveal secrets that have been buried for thousands of years. He will visit the sites of ancient cataclysms and reveal the long lost cities that lie at the heart of some of the Bibles most iconic epics.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1995, a bone of an extinct bear is found in a Slovenian cave that could rewrite our place in the story of evolution. The bone appears to be carved with intention by someone at least 10,000 years before humans arrived in that part of the world. Who made it and why? A simple black dress shoe sits in a glass case in the Heinz Nixdorf Museums Forum in Germany. The reason? More than just a shoe, this is a high-tech machine for its time, designed to do the impossible: beat the casino. And an intricate purple gemstone adorned with silver snakes, quartz scarabs and cryptic words, has a long history intertwined with illness, ruin, tragedy and death. Where did it originate, and could it really be cursed?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1898, a stunning object shows up at the British Museum. Carved and polished from a single piece of quartz, it is shaped like an immaculate human skull. Is this a creation of Mesoamericans, as originally claimed? Why is it rumoured to possess supernatural power? A gruesome-looking chair from ancient China, housed at the Wellcome Collection in London, is covered in sword blades, spikes and ornate decorations. Clearly, this is no love seat. Is it some kind of torture device, or more than meets the eye? From a long-buried library in the lost Assyrian city of Nineveh comes a peculiar round tablet scribbled with cuneiform writing. Is it the work of astronomers, proof of an ancient apocalypse, or a 3,000-year-old instruction manual?

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Fire crews race to a plane with faulty brakes, cargo vanishes, and passengers refuse to check bags. Wildlife teams deploy eagles and pyrotechnics to clear the runways, while mechanics battle to keep aircraft flight-ready. As problems unfold behind the scenes at Toronto International Airport, multiple teams fight to keep flights on schedule.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Emergency at Toronto International Airport when a flight carrying 80 passengers and crew crashes on landing on runway 23. As the airport goes into an immediate ground stop, cancelling all outbound flights and diverting incoming aircraft, the teams on the ground are pushed to their limit trying to manage the chaos that ensues when you close Canadas busiest airport.

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: a Road Trip to Remember
programme.desc: In his most personal documentary yet, Chris turns the camera on his own family after his dads recent Alzheimers diagnosis. They embark on a road trip into their past, exploring the science of social connection and how it can support memory function. They revisit meaningful places and faces, capturing it all as a home movie, and reviving treasured recollections.

programme.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough draws on a lifetime of experience to reveal Earths most spectacular underwater habitats, showing that were in the greatest age of Ocean discovery and highlighting its vital importance. While exposing the Oceans biggest challenges, Attenboroughs message is one of hope: the opportunity for marine life recovery on an unprecedented scale is within reach.

programme.title: Lost in the Jungle
programme.desc: A deadly plane crash deep in the Colombian rainforest strands four young siblings to survive 40 unimaginable days alone. For the first time, the children tell their story, revealing their epic fight to stay alive as a dramatic rescue mission unfolds around them, uniting Indigenous trackers and the military in a race against time in this gripping true story of survival, courage and hope.

programme.title: Sally
programme.desc: Sally Ride became the first American woman to blast off into space, but beneath her unflappable composure, she carried a secret. Revealing the romance and sacrifices of their 27 years together, Sallys life partner, Tam OShaughnessy, tells the full story of this complicated and iconic astronaut for the first time. SALLY is directed by Emmy Award-winning filmmaker Cristina Costantini.

programme.title: Titanic: The Digital Resurrection
programme.desc: Using cutting-edge scanning technology and state-of-the-art CGI, a team of experts produces the first high-res, 3D digital twin of the wreck of the Titanic. Through an unprecedented immersive investigation, the team reveals the ships fateful final moments, the heroics and cowardice of those on board, and the truth about how the "unsinkable" ship sank.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: This episode of Ancient X Files investigates what advances in science since the last time the shroud was tested, in 1988, might reveal about this mysterious religious relic. Developments in photo-imaging may have revealed letters hidden around the head. But who wrote them and why? One scientist believes he may have discovered that the image itself was created by a huge burst of electrical energy. Also in this episode, the discovery of a strange, buried structure dating back 4000 years could be the oldest temple in the Americas.

programme.title: Ancient X Files
programme.desc: The story of Noahs Flood washing away everything in its deadly path is not just an Old Testament tale. As well as the Bible and the Quran, similar flood stories appear in ancient cultures around the world. For centuries experts have wondered if the ubiquity of the story could be evidence of a real flood. Now new archaeological evidence unearthed in Bulgaria, Eastern Europe, may reveal not only where the Great Flood happened, but what caused it. Also in this episode, scattered around Scotland are ancient standing stones, inscribed with mysterious markings and symbols. Dr. Rob Lee, a scientist at Exeter University, believes he may have cracked their code and could be on the brink of revealing the language and secrets of an ancient civilization.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry visits Iceland to discover how this stark, treeless island became a global success story. On the geologically active Reykjanes Peninsula, she meets scientists whose lava-flow predictions saved the world-famous Blue Lagoon spa from destruction, and in Hengill she sees how a futuristic algae farm is fuelled by geothermal power - and imagination. A dip in the countrys oldest swimming pool reveals how Icelands unusually small gene pool is helping advance global health, while a horseback ride across a black sand landscape immortalised in the Icelandic sagas shows how Viking heritage continues to inspire creativity. The Icelanders Hannah encounters dont just live on the land; they negotiate with it. Their collective determination and adaptability has forged an island of ideas - and a tourist magnet the world cannot resist.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry visits South Korea to uncover how a nation once defined by war and division became a global force in culture, business, and technology. She explores the billion-dollar world of esports, learns Taekwondo from a blackbelt, meets a kimchi grandmaster, and Jejus legendary female divers. Along the way, she discovers how South Korea blends tradition with innovation; from family-run business empires to cutting-edge, everyday tech. With curiosity and humour, Hannah reveals how the countrys unique mix of ancient values and future-focused thinking turned it into a cultural superpower that continues to shape our lives.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: In Turkey, buildings claiming to be earthquake-proof end up falling down. Two gantry cranes bump into each other on a harbor in Taiwan; and a battery factory blows up in South Korea, resulting in a bad day at the office. Knob and tube wiring might be obsolete, but the Sydney Opera House is going strong, despite its many initial design flaws. The city of Dresden wishes they could reverse engineer the collapse of the Carola Bridge.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Every year, thousands of train crashes and devastating plane disasters occur worldwide. From hijackings to technological failures, these incidents highlight the inherent dangers of travel. Despite daily advancements, a single mistake can lead to catastrophic outcomes. Join us as we explore the 10 most significant air crashes and train accidents, uncovering the tragic events that capture global attention and impact countless lives.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Dive into the awe-inspiring world of Dutch engineering, where human ingenuity meets the relentless power of nature. From a remarkable sideways ship launch, to the nations largest flood barrier, each stop reveals a story of engineering innovation. Then, step back in time to uncover the ingenious, water management secrets hidden within the iconic windmills of Kinderdijk.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Explore the engineering wonders of Europes northernmost region, from Icelands epic lava-defying barriers to Finlands record-breaking vertical factory. This spectacular journey uncovers the Nordics boldest builds including the construction of the worlds largest wooden city and a Swedish ferry that doesnt just sail—it flies.

programme.title: Chris Hemsworth: a Road Trip to Remember
programme.desc: In his most personal documentary yet, Chris turns the camera on his own family after his dads recent Alzheimers diagnosis. They embark on a road trip into their past, exploring the science of social connection and how it can support memory function. They revisit meaningful places and faces, capturing it all as a home movie, and reviving treasured recollections.

programme.title: Ocean with David Attenborough
programme.desc: David Attenborough draws on a lifetime of experience to reveal Earths most spectacular underwater habitats, showing that were in the greatest age of Ocean discovery and highlighting its vital importance. While exposing the Oceans biggest challenges, Attenboroughs message is one of hope: the opportunity for marine life recovery on an unprecedented scale is within reach.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Violent cataclysms and fiery judgment fixate the popular imagination and fill numerous holy books. Morgan Freeman looks into this supposed future as well as past millennia of strife to determine how the world will end. His journey takes him to the desert that three faiths call home to pour over the Dead Sea Scrolls, and learn about the origins of the Jewish messiah. He decodes the enigmatic Mark of the Beast-666-in Rome, and sits down with a reformed Islamic terrorist. He travels to Guatemala to determine if the ancient Maya really predicted the end of the world, and learns from a psychologist why some people find comfort in catastrophes. On the brighter side, a visit with Hurricane Katrina survivors and a meditative session with one of the holiest men in all of Buddhism begins to realign Morgans perspective-what if the apocalypse is not a planetary bloodbath, but rather a mental paradigm shift?

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Where does evil come from? In a maximum-security prison, Morgan comes face to face with a serial killer, and looks for the physical root of evil in his brain. In an ancient tomb, Egyptologist Salima Ikram shows Morgan a depiction of the "weighing of the heart", and the birth of the belief that what you did in this life mattered in the next. Psychologist Jesse Bering has discovered that children who believe they are being watching by an invisible being obey the rules more than those who dont. Morgan encounters Zoroastrianism, whose belief in a cosmic balance of good and evil inspired the Christian Devil. In India, he discovers that Hindu believes evil stems from the tormented souls of ones ancestors, who are merely in need of release. Morgan explores the idea of redemption, when he former Neo-Nazi skinhead Bryon Widner, who turned his back on a life of evil.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: King Herod is reviled as one of the most evil characters in the Bible, responsible for the horrific "massacre of the innocents" in his efforts to kill the infant Jesus Christ. But later historians coin him "Herod the Great." Now, immersive CGI and new archaeological discoveries—on land and deep underwater—reveal the truth about this Biblical villain.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Bible
programme.desc: Noah and the Great Flood is one of the Bibles best-known tales. Now, investigators seek to unravel the storys origins, which may predate the Old Testament. They explore some of the earliest cities in Mesopotamia, use the latest science to examine past climates, decipher clay tablets, and put an ancient blueprint of the Ark to the test. Immersive CGI brings this long-lost story to life.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: This spectacular aerial journey reveals the Nordics as theyve never been seen before. Drone cameras soar over the Swedish Archipelago during an extraordinary competition, fly with extreme sheep herders in the Faroe Islands and reveal a curious collection of people in Finland. Well explore the five nations in the Nordic region, from the construction of the worlds longest continuous staircase to a magical festive parade unlike any other.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: This spectacular aerial journey across Europe reveals Christmas as its never been seen before. Flying cameras soar over a dazzling train of lights on Englands coastline and uncover an extraordinary logistical feat at Santas Post Office. We cross the continent to explore the unique sights that mark the festive season, from a show-stopping monsters parade, and an Alpine aerial fireworks extravaganza, to Finlands iconic reindeer herds.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: A container ship strikes the Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing it to collapse and paralyze the Port of Baltimore. Other fails include a roof collapse at a Dutch soccer stadium, a crane fire 45 floors over Manhattan, two Scottish towers that fail to fall in a controlled demolition, and a sewer pressure test in China that sends a "poonami" into the sky. Its enough to turn one to drink … at the Crooked House, Englands wonkiest pub.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: We begin with the tragic collapse of the Ponte Morandi (Morandi Bridge) in Genoa, 2018. Multiple camera angles capture the bridge crashing down in a rainstorm as vehicles drive across the iconic structure. An investigation uncovers a tale of neglect and aging concrete. The Millennium Tower was known as the most prestigious new condo tower in San Francisco. Now its known for something else: its sinking. Its leaning, the concrete is cracking, the glass is blowing out of the windows. How could a luxury complex of multi-million dollar residences fail so soon after construction?

programme.title: Cleopatras Final Secret
programme.desc: Archaeologist Kathleen Martinez is leading a thrilling detective hunt on land and underwater, to unearth the final pieces of the puzzle that will unlock the story of Cleopatras last days. Armed with the latest technology and the unparalleled skills of explorer Bob Ballard, she is guaranteed to make extraordinary discoveries. This could be the find of the century: Cleopatras Lost Tomb.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: In this opening episode, we recount the life of Chinggis Khan, beginning with the dramatic struggles of his early years, including his familys fall from power, his survival against rival tribes, and his first alliances as a young warrior determined to rescue his kidnapped wife, Borte.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: The Inca Empire rose in the 15th century, yet its origins remained shrouded in mystery for centuries. Follow Manco Capac, the first Inca and Pachacutec, the mythical emperor who reshaped a civilization. Pachacutec built Machu Picchu, revolutionized architecture, and drew on the legacy of an older society to rewrite his peoples history. Claiming the title "Son of the Sun," he expanded the empire beyond the Cuzco Valley, imposed a solar cult as the state religion, and even instituted human sacrifices to assert his power. With cutting-edge science and ultra-realistic 3D reconstructions from Machu Picchu to Chilean volcanoes, Lake Titicaca, and Cuzco, witness the breathtaking birth of the Empire of the Sun.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Buried beneath Rome lies a forgotten treasure: the Golden House - a vast palace built in the first century AD. It was the most extravagant construction in the history of Rome. Why was it buried? And what can its fate reveal about its builder - Romes most notorious emperor - Nero? As experts race to save the remains of the Golden House, archaeologists uncover new clues to its fate and its connection to Neros reputation.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of the Maya
programme.desc: National Geographic Explorer Albert Lin ventures into the Guatemalan jungle to explore how a new high-tech treasure map is revealing tens of thousands of ancient ruins. Now, dozens of archaeologists are heading on a voyage of discovery, exploring lost ruins for the first time in 1500 years. And what theyre finding is rewriting the history of one of the worlds most mysterious ancient civilisations - the Maya.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Angkor: Ancient Laos Revealed
programme.desc: A team of archaeologists investigate a priceless hoard of ancient treasure discovered in Laos. Their quest takes them to temple sites in the southeast Asian jungle as they try to find out who the stunning treasure belonged to and what it was used for. Astonishing new discoveries of gold and human remains open a window into the early years of the civilisation that built the great city of Angkor.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Angkor: Ancient Laos Revealed
programme.desc: An international team of archaeologists investigate a hoard of priceless ancient treasure discovered in the southeast Asian nation of Laos. Their mission takes them to temple sites in the jungle. Aerial scanning technology targets new areas for excavation where astonishing new discoveries are made as they as they explore the origins of the civilisation that built the great city of Angkor.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Asias Killer Hornets
programme.desc: Every Asian giant hornet colony starts with a single queen. Leaving one hive to start another, shell quickly transform an empty lair into a bustling army of ruthless, efficient killing machines. These hornets will sacrifice everything to help raise legions of grubs and protect the hive at all costs.

programme.title: Asias Weirdest
programme.desc: Asias natural world is full of weird wildlife. The largest continent on Earth has more than its fair share of peculiar plants and abnormal animals, and this documentary series delves deep into its wild landscapes to reveal some of the strangest species on offer. Expect the unexpected in places like no other, as the series heads to extraordinary locations including the rugged islands of Indonesia and the grasslands of Mongolia.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Secret Weapons. Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Sixth Sense. To win the game of life, it can take more than brute force. Animals with a super-powered sixth sense can get the edge on fast-moving prey, beat the elements, and find food in unlikely places.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Animals survive by using camouflage, mimicry, and stealth tactics. From tigers who hunt in plain sight using their orange fur as camouflage, and a spider who mimics an ant to sneak into a colony, to a bird that uses false alarm calls to trick meerkats into giving up their prey, nature deploys remarkable deception to survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isnt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: Secret Weapons. Animals wage a covert war for survival, deploying their hidden weapons with deadly precision. These adaptations, forged by eons of evolution, give animals the edge they need to outwit predators, rivals, and the elements.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: They are the backbone of the natural world, and in this documentary series, we explore some of the most interesting and amazing animals that roam our planet. Each episode focusses on two special creatures, revealing their characteristics and behaviours, and feature interviews with various experts alongside stunning video footage of the animals in their natural environments. A fascinating series that explores the animals instincts and anatomies using state-of-the-art cameras and graphics, the creatures featured include polar bears, tigers, octopuses, elephants and orangutans.

programme.desc: Katmai. In the wake of the largest volcanic eruption of the 1900s, the landscape in Katmai National Park regenerated, and a vibrant assembly of wildlife emerged. Witness the annual journey of brown bears, wolves, and salmon within the park.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lion V Buffalo. Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes.

Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Polar Bears
programme.desc: As the Arctic changes faster than ever, a team of polar bear guides prepares for an epic journey; a first-ever attempt to follow the bears on the sea ice of Hudson Bay. In this high-stakes high-reward venture, they will document the secret world of bears, a mysterious and disappearing realm that is the bears key to survival. Life on the ice is a critical time for these bears. It also remains undocumented, deemed too dangerous for humans to follow, hinted at only through aerial reconnaissance and satellite collar research. The team, armed with traditional ecological knowledge and the latest 4K camera technology, will witness never- before-seen seal hunting strategies and document rapid adaptations to climate change, including whale predation and open-water hunting.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Croc V Hippo. Hungry crocs battle a dangerous pod of hippos. The hippos take on a group of male lions. A honey badger battles for life against leopards, and wild dogs cause chaos everywhere they go!

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lion V Buffalo. Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Katmai. In the wake of the largest volcanic eruption of the 1900s, the landscape in Katmai National Park regenerated, and a vibrant assembly of wildlife emerged. Witness the annual journey of brown bears, wolves, and salmon within the park.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Zion. Zions iconic landscapes feature soaring red spires. Beyond canyons and cliffs, water emerges as a surprising force. The humble Virgin River, sculpting a geologic masterpiece over millennia, sustains diverse life in Zion National Park.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Meet remarkable wildlife, from the steadfast Wapiti wolves and resilient bison to playful grizzly cubs.

programme.desc: Big Cats V Prey. From elephants charging with lions clinging to their tusks, to turf wars between male leopards and hyenas driving a lion off his own buffalo kill, this epic safari reveals raw nature at its fiercest.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kungs ir pārliecināts, ka parka ezerā mīt briesmonis, un Padingtons dodas palīgā to pierādīt. Ir Tēva diena, un Toka vēlas nodot ziņu savam tētim, kurš ir kosmosā, ka ik dienu domā par viņu. Varbūt Braunu ģimene spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pasaules Grāmatu dienā Padingtons palīdz Mateo atkal iemīlēt grāmatu lasīšanu un atklāt iemīļotāko tēlu, par kuru pārģērbties. Padingtons, Simi un Džonatans uz parka salas medī dinozauru, bet dinozauri taču vairs neeksistē, vai tiesa?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atver Vindzoru dārzu pirmo dzīvnieku viesnīcu, kad pie viņa apmetas Lakijs. Bāzs parkā izveidojis minigolfu, bet vai tas ir tiešām neuzveicams, kā viņš apgalvo? Kā lai Padingtons notur nūju?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons kopā ar bērniem dzird Brauna kunga plānu pārdot māju. Vai viņiem būs jāpamet Vindzoru dārzi? Bērni spēlējas dārzā un atrod ko asu. Kaut kas nav kārtībā, tāpēc Padingtons lūdz Bāza palīdzību.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Ir Padingtona dzimšanas diena, un Brauni viņam uzdāvina ne tikai gardu kūku, bet arī jauku piedzīvojumu – ekskursiju pa Londonu. Taču piedzīvojums izvēršas pavisam neparasts, kad Padingtons apmaldās un attopas pie kādiem īpašiem vārtiem, caur kuriem nokļūst Londonas Tauerā un vairāku netīšu un nelāgu kļūmju dēļ sarīko jandāliņu ar kroņa dārglietām.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons gatavo lipekli, bet vai viņš spēs turēt doto vārdu neradīt jucekli, kad lietas vairs nav kontrolējamas? Padingtons un Simi dodas brīnumainā ceļojumā pa cilvēka ķermeni, lai redzētu, vai apēsta ābola sēkliņa vēderā var izaugt par koku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots. Barbamazuļi iestāda avokado koku. Taču līdz ražai jāgaida vairāki gadi. Barbagudrajam ir ideja ietaupīt laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakarā Rabls ar komandu saņem zvanu no Ziemassvētku vecīša. Viņam vajadzīga palīdzība, lai pagūtu uztaisīt rotaļlietas uz Ziemassvētkiem! Taču, kad Ātrmeistars to noklausās un cenšas tēlot varoni, Rablam un suņiem jāglābj Ziemassvētki.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļas Ziemassvētki
programme.desc: Rabls nevar sagaidīt, kad pienāks Ziemassvētki, jo viņš cer, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis uzdāvinās viņam lāzerurbi. Kad mērs Hamdingers uzzina, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis ir saaukstējies, viņš izlemj paņemt visas dāvanas sev.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš lūdz jauno lietus mākonīti Klaudiju piepildīt izžuvušu ūdens slidkalniņu. Zābaciņam piemetas astiņkute, kuru var izārstēt burvju vardīte - ja vien nopelnīs savas burvju svītras, palīdzot draugiem lietusmežā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Santaklausam atgūt Garnadža nočieptās kamanas un nogādāt dāvanas visiem Lietusmeža iemītniekiem. Dora izglābj Ziemassvētkus! Dora satiek mākonīti Koldu un palīdz viņai šķērsot mežu un atgriezties mājās - Sniega kalnā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Alberts
programme.desc: Alberts, maza eglīte, kura ir sajūsmā par Ziemassvētkiem, dodas ceļā no stādu audzētavas uz lielpilsētu, lai piepildītu savus sapņus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kas rada dīvainos trokšņus alā? Džonatans domā, ka tā ir nāriņa, bet Padingtons nav pārliecināts Džūdija vēlas atrast fosiliju pludmalē, pārējiem, šķiet, veicas, izņemot viņu, vai Padingtons spēs palīdzēt?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzzina, ka kaijas mīl frī kartupeļus un darīs visu, lai tos iegūtu, bet vai viņš spēs nogādāt pusdienas, kamēr tās ir karstas? Bākas gaisma ir sabojājusies, un ir miglaina nakts, vai Padingtons var palīdzēt izglābt kuģi jūrā?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kad Vindzoras dārzos sāk pazust lietas, Džonatans domā, ka pie vainas ir melnais caurums, tādēļ Padingtons dodas kosmosa misijā. Simi un Padingtons mēģina varavīksnes galā atrast podu ar zeltu pēc tam, kad ir nejauši saplēsuši Baza kaleidoskopu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons uzbūvē robotu, vārdā Padingtrons, taču, lai tas strādātu, nepieciešams īsts draugs. Bazs ielūdz visus uz Divali svinībām, Padingtons ir viņa strādīgais asistents, bet vai viņiem abiem izdosies izbaudīt svētku noslēguma uguņošanu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Toka skrienas ar laiku, lai redzētu pirmo pilno Saules aptumsumu savā mūžā. Padingtons saņem izgudrotāja balvu Simi vietā, kad viņa ir pārāk sakautrējusies, lai atzītos, bet kādēļ gan viņa pēc tam izjūt greizsirdību un skumjas?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Brauni dodas uz pludmali, lai pavadītu brīvdienas, un, ierodoties tur, satiek bākas uzraugu Šantiju. Padingtons, Džonatans un Džūdija apgūst glābēju praksi un ar glābēja Teilora palīdzību izglābj Brauna kungu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni - Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals - suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss - suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi - katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu - sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts - Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komandai jāizdekorē Sjerras Spīdošās skatuve, koncerts izvēršas neticams Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz rumpuļiem pagatavot troļļa džemu, pirms Īgnais Trollis pārrodas, lai našķētos. Dorai un Zābaciņam jāatrod un jānoliek vietā burvju kaķītis, kurš visiem draugiem liek uzvesties kā kaķiem!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata puķītes Zilo Atsperīgo, Margriezīti un Mazo Rozīti, lai Isa varētu doties uz karalisku tējas pēcpusdienu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz mazajai Andreai atrast burvju lapu, kas ļauj alebrihei saņemt maģiskās spējas.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Ķepu patruļas Ziemassvētki
programme.desc: Rabls nevar sagaidīt, kad pienāks Ziemassvētki, jo viņš cer, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis uzdāvinās viņam lāzerurbi. Kad mērs Hamdingers uzzina, ka Ziemassvētku vecītis ir saaukstējies, viņš izlemj paņemt visas dāvanas sev.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakarā Rabls ar komandu saņem zvanu no Ziemassvētku vecīša. Viņam vajadzīga palīdzība, lai pagūtu uztaisīt rotaļlietas uz Ziemassvētkiem! Taču, kad Ātrmeistars to noklausās un cenšas tēlot varoni, Rablam un suņiem jāglābj Ziemassvētki.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziemassvētku vakarā Rabls ar komandu saņem zvanu no Ziemassvētku vecīša. Viņam vajadzīga palīdzība, lai pagūtu uztaisīt rotaļlietas uz Ziemassvētkiem! Taču, kad Ātrmeistars to noklausās un cenšas tēlot varoni, Rablam un suņiem jāglābj Ziemassvētki.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Alberts
programme.desc: Alberts, maza eglīte, kura ir sajūsmā par Ziemassvētkiem, dodas ceļā no stādu audzētavas uz lielpilsētu, lai piepildītu savus sapņus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Lūkasam uzbūvēt lieliskāko Zinātnes izstādes vulkānu. Vai Vingsija stāsies izvirduma ceļā?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoru dārzos ir divi jauni varoņi - Misters Lieliskais un Retais Lācis, bet vai Džonatans un Džūdija būs sajūsmā? Džonatans tiek pasludināts par varoni pēc reta gnoma izglābšanas, bet vai glābšana bija tikpat varonīga kā viņa stāsti?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džūdija atklāj savu iekšējo varoni, kad reindžeru nometnē sākas vētra un viņiem ir nepieciešams patvērums Padingtons sadraudzējas ar ātru gliemezi, kuru gaida varonīga nākotne, bet kāpēc viņa izskatās tik skumja?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī tiek uzbūvēta pirmā viesnīca, kad ciemos atbrauc fermeres Zojas brālēns Hedlijs. Kad juceklis uz dabas takas apmulsina visus Dakija Dū kunga dzimšanas dienas ballītes viesus, ķepaiņi viņiem palīdz atrast ceļu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons vada dārgumu medības, lai atrastu kapteiņa Zaļbārža laupījumu, bet vai viņi paliks draugi un dalīsies? Ikviens vēlas uzvarēt smilšu pils konkursā un baudīt īpašu saldējuma balvu, bet galvenais ir komandas darbs!

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un Brauni glābj tuklīšu mazuļus, kuri, tā vietā, lai veiktu pirmo lidojumu, apmaldās apmetnē Padingtons kopā ar Džonatanu un Džūdiju izbauda niršanas piedzīvojumu - bet kur ir Džūdijas kaklarota?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Pludmalē valda nekārtība, bet vai visi atkritumi tiks savlaicīgi novākti līdz pludmales ballītei, ko visi ir tik ļoti gaidījuši? Vasaras brīvdienas ir beigušās, tāpēc ir pienācis laiks atvadīties no jaunajiem draugiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtona pasaule kļūst daudz plašāka. Viņš izlaužas ārpus Vindzorgārdenas robežām un dodas arvien aizraujošākos piedzīvojumos. Braunu ģimene dodas atvaļinājumā uz jūras piekrasti, aicinot skatītājus uz brīnišķīgiem piedzīvojumiem, apmeklējot tādas jaunas vietas kā Dinozauru sala un pat melnais caurums. Un no Peru pie Padingtona ciemos atbrauc ļoti īpaša viešņa –Lūsijas tante!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: WITS Academy
programme.desc: Now a Guardian in training at WITS Academy, the Magic Realms most esteemed school for Witches and Wizards in Training, it seems like Andis dream has finally come true. But as the best friend and unofficial Guardian to the Chosen One, shell have to work hard to prove that she can live up to expectations as the first (and only) human Guardian. Plus, shes in charge of getting the Magical Realms toughest witch and wizard to graduation day, one of which is Jaxs little sister Jessie! Along the way shell have to decide who is a friend, who is a foe and who may be more...

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Bubble and Firefly are on the lookout for an amazing adventure, so they head to Gargamels hovel. Once there, they see that Dwayne and Rowena are spending the night at their uncles. Rowena is desperate for the tooth fairy to come and get her baby tooth thats hanging on by a thread! This gives Bubble an idea: theyre going to steal Rowenas tooth and take it back to the village to prove that theyre also adventurers. // When Gargamel finds a way of turning off all the lights thanks to a magic switch, the Smurfs are plunged into complete darkness. Only Firefly can help them to see in the dark ... but that attracts Gargamel to the village. He catches all of the Smurfs, except for Firefly, who will have to be very brave to free her friends. This gives her a great confidence boost!

programme.title: The Smurfs
